properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.loadbalancer.isolation.isolation-header-key
properties.description: Allows setting the name of the header used for traffic isolation policy.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.loadbalancer.isolation.isolation-metadata-key
properties.description: Allows setting the name of the metadata used for traffic isolation policy.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gateway.loadbalancer.isolation.baseline-env-name
properties.description: Allows setting the name of the baseline env used for traffic isolation policy.
